data.name: AcceptDisclaimer
data.value: INSERT INTO [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog] VALUES (@DisclaimerId, @UserId, @Date)

data.name: ArtifactIdByGuid
data.value: SELECT [ArtifactID] FROM [EDDSDBO].[ArtifactGuid] (NOLOCK) WHERE [ArtifactGuid] = @Guid

data.name: CreateDisclaimerErrorTable
data.value: IF OBJECT_ID('eddsdbo.KCD_1042192_DisclaimerError') IS NULL BEGIN CREATE TABLE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerError]( [Date] [datetime] NOT NULL, [UserID] [int] NOT NULL, [Error] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL ) END

data.name: CreateDisclaimerLogTable
data.value: IF OBJECT_ID('eddsdbo.KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog') IS NULL BEGIN CREATE TABLE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog]( [DisclaimerID] [int] NOT NULL, [UserID] [int] NOT NULL, [DateAccepted] [datetime] NOT NULL ) END

data.name: CreateDislcaimerArchiveTable
data.value: IF OBJECT_ID('eddsdbo.KCD_1042192_DisclaimerArchive') IS NULL BEGIN CREATE TABLE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerArchive]( [ID] [int] NOT NULL primary key, [Title] [nvarchar](255) NOT NULL, [DisclaimerText] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL, [DateCreated] [datetime] NOT NULL ) END

data.name: DisableDisclaimerSolution
data.value: BEGIN TRANSACTION DisableDisclaimerSolution UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Configuration] SET [Value] = '' WHERE [Section] = 'kCura.EDDS.Web' AND [Name] = 'TermsLinkHref' UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] SET [Message] = '' COMMIT TRANSACTION DisableDisclaimerSolution

data.name: DisableDisclaimerSolutionSept
data.value: BEGIN TRANSACTION DisableDisclaimerSolutionSept UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Configuration] SET [Value] = 'False' WHERE [Section] = 'kCura.EDDS.Web' AND [Name] = 'UsersMustAgreeToTermsOfUse' UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] SET [Message] = '' COMMIT TRANSACTION DisableDisclaimerSolutionSept

data.name: EnableDisclaimerSolution
data.value: BEGIN TRANSACTION EnableDisclaimerSolution UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] SET [Message] = @HTML IF @@rowcount = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] VALUES(@HTML) END UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Configuration] SET [Value] = 'True' WHERE [Section] = 'kCura.EDDS.Web' AND [Name] = 'TermsLinkHref' COMMIT TRANSACTION EnableDisclaimerSolution

data.name: EnableDisclaimerSolutionSept
data.value: BEGIN TRANSACTION EnableDisclaimerSolutionSept UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] SET [Message] = @HTML IF @@rowcount = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] VALUES(@HTML) END UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Configuration] SET [Value] = 'True' WHERE [Section] = 'kCura.EDDS.Web' AND [Name] = 'UsersMustAgreeToTermsOfUse' COMMIT TRANSACTION EnableDisclaimerSolutionSept

data.name: FindGroupUsers
FlagUsersWhoAlreadyAccepted
FlagUsersWhoNeedToAccept
GetApplicationArtifactIdOfRelatedObject
data.value: SELECT [ApplicationArtifactID] FROM [EDDSDBO].[ApplicationObjectType] AS [AOT] WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [EDDSDBO].[ArtifactGuid] AS [AG] WITH(NOLOCK) ON AOT.ObjectTypeArtifactID = AG.ArtifactID WHERE [AG].ArtifactGuid = @ObjectGuid

data.name: GetDisclaimerObjTableName
data.value: SELECT '[EDDSDBO].[' +[ArtifactType] +']' FROM [EDDSDBO].[ArtifactType] (NOLOCK) AS [AT] WHERE [ArtifactTypeID] IN( SELECT [OT].[DescriptorArtifactTypeID] FROM [EDDSDBO].[ObjectType] (NOLOCK) AS [OT] INNER JOIN [EDDSDBO].[ArtifactGuid] (NOLOCK) AS [AG] ON [OT].[ArtifactID] = [AG].[ArtifactID] WHERE [AG].[ArtifactGuid] = @DisclaimerObjGuid )

data.name: LogError
data.value: INSERT INTO [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerError] VALUES(@Date, @UserID, @ErrorMessage)

data.name: MoveDisclaimerToArchive
data.value: INSERT INTO [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerArchive] ([ID], [Title], [DisclaimerText], [DateCreated]) SELECT [D].[ArtifactID], [D].[Title], [D].[Text], [A].[CreatedOn] FROM {0} AS [D] INNER JOIN [eddsdbo].[Artifact] (NOLOCK) AS [A] On [D].[ArtifactID] = A.[ArtifactID] WHERE [D].[ArtifactID] = @CurrentArtifactID

data.name: NonAccepptedAllUsers
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT [U].[ArtifactID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[User] (NOLOCK) AS [U] WHERE [U].[ArtifactID] NOT IN ( SELECT [LOG].[UserID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog] AS [LOG] WHERE [LOG].[DisclaimerID] = @DisclaimerArtifactID )

data.name: NonAccepptedAllUsersTimeCriteria
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT [U].[ArtifactID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[User] (NOLOCK) AS [U] WHERE [U].[ArtifactID] NOT IN ( SELECT [LOG].[UserID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog] AS [LOG] WHERE [LOG].[DisclaimerID] = @DisclaimerArtifactID AND DATEADD(DAY, @ReacceptancePeriod, [LOG].[DateAccepted]) > GETDATE() )

data.name: NonAcceptedUsersByGroups
NonAcceptedUsersByGroupsTimeCriteria
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT [U].[ArtifactID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[User] (NOLOCK) AS [U] INNER JOIN [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[GroupUser] (NOLOCK) AS [GU] ON [GU].[UserArtifactID] = [U].[ArtifactID] WHERE [GU].[GroupArtifactID] IN ({0}) AND [U].[ArtifactID] NOT IN ( SELECT [LOG].[UserID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[KCD_1042192_DisclaimerAcceptanceLog] AS [LOG] WHERE [LOG].[DisclaimerID] = @DisclaimerArtifactID AND DATEADD(DAY, @ReacceptancePeriod, [LOG].[DateAccepted]) > GETDATE() )

data.name: UpdateLoginPage
data.value: UPDATE [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[Disclaimer] SET [Message] = @HTML

data.name: WorkspacesWhereAppIsInstalled
data.value: SELECT TOP 1 [CA].[CaseID] FROM [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[CaseApplication] (NOLOCK) AS [CA] INNER JOIN [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[ArtifactGuid] (NOLOCK) AS [AG] ON [CA].[ApplicationID] = [AG].[ArtifactID] INNER JOIN [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[ExtendedCase] (NOLOCK) AS [EC] ON [CA].[CaseID] = [EC].[ArtifactID] INNER JOIN [EDDS].[eddsdbo].[ApplicationInstall] AS [AI] WITH(NOLOCK) ON CA.[CurrentApplicationInstallID] = AI.[ApplicationInstallID] WHERE [AG].[ArtifactGuid] = @ApplicationGuid AND [AI].[Status] = 6 --Relativity.Data.ApplicationInstall.vb lists 6 as a successfull. Workspaces with a bad install is populated with a 1
data.comment: This is gets a list of workspaces where the application is installed, it's odered by the Identity CaseApplicationID column so we know the first workspace returned was the initial place the app was installed
